Author: brianmckenzie
Content: I try to spend two weeks out of each year without computers or the internet - usually one week off for every six months on. That may sound like a lot, but in practice it hardly matters because I spend such a huge % of all my other time on here, and it is very possible to get work done without a computer. I find that I get many of my best ideas when I'm forced to take a step back and live in the non-tech world for awhile.

Author: phil
Content:
I think this is a really important point. Here:\nhttp://www.alexa.com/data/details/traffic_details?site0=twitter.com&site1=jaiku.com&site2=&site3=&site4=&y=r&z=1&h=300&w=610&range=6m&size=Medium&url=twitter.com\nhttp://snapshot.compete.com/twitter.com+jaiku.com

If you believe the public stats, Jaiku is 6x-15x smaller that Twitter.

Author: sabat
Content:
G cares if you mix adsense with other contextual text advertising. banners, text link ads, display ads are all fair game.

Did you mean "does not care"? Being "all fair game" implies that you mean that Google does not care.
